name: golden_06_explosion_staff
prompt: create a staff that causes explosions where I click

verify.code: () => { const items = window.__VOXEL_GAME__.itemFactory.itemTypes; const staff = Object.values(items).find(i => i.name.toLowerCase().includes('explosion') || i.name.toLowerCase().includes('staff')); return staff ? { success: true } : { success: false }; }
